mapper.select: SELECT word_idx, word_logical_nm, word_physical_nm FROM tb_std_word WHERE word_idx > (#{page_num} - 1) * 10 ORDER BY word_idx ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT word_idx, word_logical_nm, word_physical_nm, word_logical_desc, word_physical_desc, synonym_list FROM tb_std_word WHERE word_idx = #{word_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_std_word(word_logical_nm, word_physical_nm, word_logical_desc, word_physical_desc, synonym_list) VALUES (#{word_logical_nm}, #{word_physical_nm}, #{word_logical_desc}, #{word_physical_desc}, #{synonym_list})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_std_word SET word_logical_nm = #{word_logical_nm}, word_physical_nm = #{word_physical_nm}, word_logical_desc = #{word_logical_desc}, word_physical_desc = #{word_physical_desc}, synonym_list = #{synonym_list} WHERE word_idx = #{word_idx}
